name: New Eden
description: Travel to Meridian in the Gamma Quadrant to find Garth of Izar, who believes the planet to be Eden, and will try to conquer the M-113 creatures living there. You have only a short time window before the planet will phase into a different dimension!
rules:
— Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of McCoy, Scotty, M-113, Garth, or TOS Bridge Crew (TOS Spock, Chapel, Kirk, Chekov, Uhura, Rand, H. Sulu) will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
— Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
— Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: McCoy, Scotty, M-113, Garth, or TOS Bridge Crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

adventures.name: Just in Case
adventures.description: Scavenge some plates for the Meridian body armor.

adventures.name: Material Witness
adventures.description: Trade to get some lining material for the Meridian armor.

adventures.name: A New Computer
adventures.description: Install a computer monitoring system for the Meridian armor.

adventures.name: Safe Space
adventures.description: Craft armor to protect against the M-113's desalination.

rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.description: Gather the Federation dossier on Garth for the M-113.

adventures.name: A Fighting Chance
adventures.description: Teach Federation combat techniques to the M-113.

adventures.name: Cookoff
adventures.description: Obtain grenades from the Federation for the M-113.

rewards.name: 10x Portal

goals.flavor: Use Romulan resources to equip and defend the M-113s.
Accept the Ferengi Alliance offer to help defeat Garth.

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Meridian isn't like anything we've encountered before. It's an interphasic planet -- it exists in more than one dimension, and is only visible to us once every sixty years, for a very specific window. Chances are there isn't anyone alive right now who has seen Meridian!"
"Captain, I'm reading that Meridian is an M-class planet with lush vegetation. I'm reading a cluster of humanoids on the surface, but you won't believe this. They're M-113!"

"But...the one we encountered was the last of its kind! At least that's what we were led to believe. I wonder whether that last one knew about this colony on Meridian. With the interphasic time window, I doubt it. What I do know is those creatures are dangerous."

"The M-113's can siphon out all the sodium from other creatures. That's the salt in our blood and sweat. I can't recommend we go down there without taking some protective measures first. Would you help us engineer something to keep those fellows from getting too salty?"

responses.text: "How will we communicate with the M-113's?"
"What will we do to defeat Garth?"

screens.text: "This equipment should do nicely, Captain. Thank you! Those M-113's shouldn't give us any trouble now. And I hope you'll come with us, Captain. It's historic -- You won't see this planet again in your lifetime!"

"We can search for any remains of the Aurora crew. Otherwise, if Eden is Meridian but they never found it, Garth may choose to make it his own Eden, in order to escape to other dimensions! Guess we'll see."
"Oh, I forgot to mention...we don't have to! They're telepathic! We will just read each other's thoughts. Pretty neat stuff when they can't physically hurt us anymore."
"We will alert the M-113's as to what's going on, and do what we can to offer resources and defense."

You hear the M-113 speak in your mind: [Thank you for coming to our aid. We know you are here in friendship. We will accept your assistance. You have nothing to fear from us. Garth is on the planet and intends to make war against us.]

"Kirk to away team. We've got company up here. It's Commander Keras of the Romulans again. Perhaps they can help us, or we can accept the aid that was promised by the Ferengi. We could also call in Federation reinforcements. Captain, I'll act on your recommendation."
